meanings.definition: A motorcycle designed for high speed and quick maneuverability.
meanings.sent1: I saw a sleek sportbike zooming down the road.
meanings.sent2: He enjoys riding his sportbike on the twisty mountain roads.
meanings.sent3: The sportbike looked like a lightning bolt on wheels.
meanings.sent4: Her sportbike sliced through traffic like a hot knife through butter.
meanings.sent5: The roar of the sportbike echoed through the canyon, leaving a trail of excitement behind.

meanings.definition: To ride or operate a sportbike.
meanings.sent1: She learned how to sportbike after taking lessons.
meanings.sent2: They plan to sportbike together on the weekend.
meanings.sent3: Sportbiking through the city streets felt like flying on two wheels.
meanings.sent4: He sportbiked his way to the finish line in record time.
meanings.sent5: Sportbiking requires skill and focus to navigate the roads safely.
